name: Conducktor
description:
You are a small duck with a big job. As a newly hired music director for "The Church",  can you appease both your bosses and the long-dead composers whose music you are performing? Compromise is key!

Note for Summer Slow Jams facilitators: The initial builds posted here, under the names "Conducktor" and "ConducktorBuild" were the ones posted close to the deadline for the game jam. We've since added some updated builds that fix a few bugs and add an option to close the game; feel free to disregard the newer ones if necessary.

Note for everyone besides the Summer Slow Jams facilitators: If you're interested in playing this game, we encourage you to download the latest build for your system, which currently will be the one with "1.1" in the name.
